name: Plugin Fazaé WP Booster
author: Fazaé

sections.description:
WordPress Booster By Fazaé

Boost your WordPress and unleash the full potential of your Fazaé hosting with the Fazaé WordPress Booster plugin.

Fazaé has designed a WordPress-optimized hosting platform to relieve you of all system administration tasks. Focus on your content and rely on us to keep the machines running.

Our WordPress hosting solution is based on Fazaé’s high-availability hosting infrastructure. We have also integrated tools and optimizations specifically tailored for WordPress.

This plugin simply activates all available optimizations for WordPress on Fazaé servers.

The Fazaé WP Booster also automates the conversion of images to WebP, allowing you to fully leverage the benefits of the WebP format without having to go through tedious steps! No need to subscribe to additional services, our plugin independently replaces the file according to the browser.

Achieve maximum results on Google PageSpeed Insights with just one plugin!

Features

  1. Use of Varnish cache
  2. Use of CDNs for your images.
  3. Optimization of CSS and JS files.
  4. Optimization of your site for HTTP/2.
  5. Lazy-loading of images.
  6. Transparent conversion and compression of images.
  7. Automatic WebP conversion.
  8. And more to come!

Setup

  1. In your WordPress back-office, go to Plugins > Add New, search for fazaeWPBooster and click on “Install now“.
  2. You can also download the plugin here as an archive named fazaeWPBooster.zip, which you can extract to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. If you need any help, please contact the team at Fazaé. We would be really happy to help !
  4. Activate the newly-installed plugin by clicking on Activate.
  5. Configure the plugin to your liking by clicking on “WordPress Booster” in the new “Fazaé” menu in the admin sidebar.
sections.faq:
Do I need to be hosted at Fazaé ?

Yes ! Most of the enhancements made possible by this plugin rely on the power of our hosting.

I need help / I want to ask for a new feature

You can contact Fazaé by following this link : (https://www.fazae.com/contact/)[https://www.fazae.com/contact/]
sections.changelog:
1.4.0

  • Auto-conversion of your pictures in WebP format
  • UX Improvements
  • Bugfixes

1.3.0

  • New “Fazaé Analytics” integration
  • Cache-clearing improvements
  • Bugfixes

1.2.0

  • Lazy-loading of your pictures

1.1.0

  • JS and CSS files minification
  • HTTP/2 (push) support

1.0.0

  • FazaCache integration
  • CDN integration
  • Services checklists
